name: NextChat - AI Assistant Platform
description: Deploy a complete AI chat interface with support for OpenAI GPT, Anthropic Claude, Google Gemini, DeepSeek, and 20+ other AI providers. Features include vision models, code generation, Model Context Protocol (MCP) tools, real-time audio chat, and a modern responsive interface.

OPENAI_API_KEY.description: Your OpenAI API key for GPT models access

ACCESS_CODE.description: Password to secure your NextChat instance (auto-generated if empty)

GOOGLE_API_KEY.description: Google Gemini API key (optional for Gemini models)

ANTHROPIC_API_KEY.description: Anthropic Claude API key (optional for Claude models)

BASE_URL.description: Custom OpenAI API base URL (leave empty for default)

HIDE_USER_API_KEY.description: Hide user API key input for security
